settings.title: 100% Original
settings.text: Stay cool, dry and comfy with genuine 98 Fahren products that feature our very best technologies.

settings.title: Secure Payments
settings.text: Our products are safe to use, and so are our payment gateways. Engineered with SSL Encryption.

settings.title: Easy 30-Day Returns
settings.text: Get only the best from us. If a product doesn't suit you, return it easily within 30 days of delivery.

settings.title: Free Worldwide Shipping
settings.text: We know you can't wait to cool down. So, we use express shipping to all countries for free!
